connection._comment: Azure DPS credentials - get these from Azure Portal

device._comment: Use a unique device name like 'bugbash-yourname'

test._comment: Scenario options: success, provision-only, renew-only, telemetry-only

renewal._comment: Custom renewal payload. Use {id} for device ID and {csr} for the CSR.
renewal._comment2: Remove 'payload' or set to null to use default: {"id": device_id, "csr": csr_data}

telemetry._comment: Number of test messages to send
